Script Task

This type of task allows a trigger to be executed when the flow arrives to that task. Some of the characteristics of a script task are the following:

  • oWhen the task is ready to start, the engine will execute the script.
  • oWhen the script is completed, the task will also be completed.

After adding a script task to the design, configure it by going to its properties to add the code that will be executed.

In the window that opens, there are two ways to add the trigger that will be executed by the task. 1.By selecting the trigger from the Title dropdown menu. 2.The code added to the trigger will be shown in the Code textarea.

By creating the trigger directly from the window by clicking on the plus symbol (+). 1. Add the name of the new trigger and the code in the Code textarea.

Save the configuration of the properties of the task that will execute the trigger when running cases.
